title: 你们一开始玩最害怕的生物
author: Redstone_Brain
txt_content:
如题，
你们一开始玩MC生存最害怕的生物是什么？
反正我最怕的是蜘蛛，
黑暗中那对红色的发光的眼睛……

replies.author: Arec
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕没了

replies.author: Redstone_Brain
replies.txt_content:
Arec 发表于 2020-8-20 14:31
苦力怕没了
因为会炸？

replies.author: Arec
replies.txt_content:
HerobrineQWQ 发表于 2020-8-20 14:32
因为会炸？
对滴我亲爱的朋友

replies.author: zadqfs
replies.txt_content: 小黑 永远的神！！！

replies.author: VSdadadada
replies.txt_content: 骷髅，因为是弓箭手

replies.author: what2036836155
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕的爆炸会爆炸房子

replies.author: Laulee
replies.txt_content: 哈哈哈哈 me too

replies.author: Laulee
replies.txt_content: 我倒是不怕creeper 它们长得太可爱了

replies.author: xming_jun
replies.txt_content: 蠹虫 因为看起来很恶心

replies.author: Laulee
replies.txt_content: 还记得我刚玩Minecraft的时候 10个存档都死于骷髅 死了就懒得复活了

replies.author: Laulee
replies.txt_content: .....原谅我无耻的笑

replies.author: mc方块♦️
replies.txt_content: 小白和苦力怕

replies.author: MMP(mcmap)
replies.txt_content: 僵尸和女巫,我很怕

replies.author: 开心的阿诺
replies.txt_content:
Creeper?
Awww man!!!

replies.author: Wgst_凋灵
replies.txt_content: 刚开始看不懂，都是创造

replies.author: EA_salt
replies.txt_content: 精污末影人

replies.author: Tfriendhb
replies.txt_content: JJ怪 懂我的意思吧

replies.author: 居仕�_jsjsgo
replies.txt_content: 现在都怕骷髅。太变态了。

replies.author: TheSound
replies.txt_content: 最怕him，以为就在我家下面，看了杀人视频之后

replies.author: Jurassiccraft
replies.txt_content: 蠹虫没跑了……那邪恶的眼神+莫名其妙的出现=啊呀妈妈我不玩了

replies.author: 殆辰羽_
replies.txt_content:
骷髅，我曾经水战小白
后果懂

replies.author: MC_xiao_bo
replies.txt_content: 毒蜘蛛.带毒的都恶心觉得..毒一下效果半天不下去..

replies.author: Ja桑
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕永远的神

replies.author: Rintsu张三
replies.txt_content: 一直都是苦力怕...... 那个爆炸我真的是！

replies.author: asd1827795321
replies.txt_content: 小白，我第一次玩是被小白射死的

replies.author: 阿尔法1222
replies.txt_content:
一开始开和平
后面玩几年后只要不是特别缺吃的那就困难锁死

replies.author: star3344
replies.txt_content: 小白摸不到，苦力怕又会炸自己的房子

replies.author: 曦灬月
replies.txt_content: 幻翼

replies.author: 海风和
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕，贴身一炸直接上天

replies.author: lovexyn0827
replies.txt_content: 骷髅，遇见必死

replies.author: czr3826
replies.txt_content: 蜘蛛是真滴恶心 特别是洞穴蜘蛛 还有毒 主要是蜘蛛跳过来 顶不住啊 然后就是苦力怕 刷背后boom

replies.author: 最shuai万能小二
replies.txt_content: 那当然是什么都怕啦！我都不敢挖矿的！

replies.author: 诡灬稽
replies.txt_content: 最怕水怪淹了我的房子

replies.author: xiaomu_233
replies.txt_content: 我最怕的是苦力怕，真就跟玩恐怖游戏一样，突然去世

replies.author: BigKillBla
replies.txt_content: 当然是苦力怕了 emmm老恐怖了

replies.author: DemooQAQ
replies.txt_content: 感觉是小黑吧 小黑摸一下是真的疼 但是又要珍珠

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Redstone_Brain
replies.txt_content:
Arec 发表于 2020-8-20 14:31
苦力怕没了
我只是烦苦力怕，并不是怕它。
因为穿了全套装备基本不扣血，
所以说它在你后面炸掉的话根本不会死，
只会拆家。

replies.author: 嗷嗷喵
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕，下矿杀手

replies.author: tianran000
replies.txt_content: 一开始不了解，啥都怕，打怪的时候手都会出汗，生存都只敢开和平2333
